Name: }bedrock.cube.clone

Parameters.Name: pTgtCube
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Target cube to create/re-create (Default = pSrcCube | '_Clone')

Parameters.Name: pFilter
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Filter on cube in format: 'dim_one¦ el_one + el_two & dim_two¦ el_one + el_two'

Parameters.Name: pDimDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimiter for start of dimension/element set in filter parameters (Default = '&')

Parameters.Name: pEleStartDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimiter for start of element list in filter parameters (Default = '¦')

Parameters.Name: pEleDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimiter between elements in filter parameters (Default = '+')

Parameters.Name: pTemp
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delete/create temporary objects (0 = Do not delete, 1 = Delete, 2 = if view and subsets are created, keep only subsets)

Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean. Default = 0)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean. Default = 0)

Parameters.Name: pCubeLogging
Parameters.Prompt: OBSOLETE: This parameter does nothing and is only included for backwards compatability

Parameters.Name: pJson
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: JSON Object with process parameter values. This will overwrite user passed parameters for all included parameters.
